antcolony
Class AntColony

java.lang.Object
  antcolony.AntColony

public class AntColony
extends java.lang.Object

Ant Colony - Represents a colony of agents Each Ant Colony has a corresponding running configuration and a corresponding running model.

1.0
Version:

António Fonseca
